title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary 
Increase of Official Controls and Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and 
Feed of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (temporary increase official control emergency measure import food feed non-animal origin) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 9 of 2020) are amended by substituting in Regulation 
3(1) for the definition of “Regulation 2019/1793” the following – 

“‘Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing Regulation 
(EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 20192 as amended by Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 20203, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1540 of 22 October 20204 and 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/608 of 14 April 
2021;”. 

1 O.J. No. L129 of 15.04.2021, p.119 
2 O.J. No. L277 of 29.10.2019, p. 89 
3 O.J. No. L144 of 7.5.2020, p. 13 
4 O.J. No. L353 of 23.10.2020, p. 4 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No.664 of 2020) are revoked. 

[309] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 June, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [309]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update existing Regulations with regard to additional levels 
of controls on the import of certain food of non animal origin from specific third 
countries with regard to pesticide residues and on the import of certain feed of 
non-animal origin from specific third countries 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [309] 5
